title: Nate Newton from Converge/Jesuit/Old Man Gloom/Doomriders
itunes:title: Nate Newton from Converge/Jesuit/Old Man Gloom/Doomriders
description:
Episode 329 - Oh boy, what an absolute treat do I have in store for you today. Nate Newton, the bassist of Converge/Jesuit/Old Man Gloom/Doomriders and more, is hanging out today. I spoke to him about confidence, the business of being in a band and how he has viewed/dealt with hecklers over the years. It’s a fun and insightful conversation with a dude who has been involved for many years in this rad community. Enjoy!  Dive into YouTube Music and their new app, it’s the BEST place to stream all of your favorite music and discovering your new favorite bands. Want a better night sleep? Try a Casper for 100 days and your life will change. DO IT UP and get $50 off with promo code WORDS  Away is the best luggage you will ever use, hands down. Let me give you $20 off your first purchase by using the code WORDS.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
